title: Ticket #4478: Update web submit examples page
description:
Example 6 on the job submission examples web page is not quite correct. It very quietly assumes a shared file system in order to work.

Example 7 needs a better explanation why the Requirements are to be set. Defaults assume that the matched execute machine be of the same platform as the submit machine if no OpSys/Arch are specified. The example should state this. Otherwise, why would this not have been necessary for the previous 6 examples?

Example 8 should not be using files named with mathematica.
remarks:
2014-Jul-23 11:28:15 by smoler:
Actually, example 6 is correct, as standard universe does not need the file transfer mechanism. Best to explicitly state this.
creator: smoler
